content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I get your name to get started with booking your service?
Thanks, Matt! Can you please provide your address so we can make sure you’re in our service area?
Got it, thank you! Now, could you briefly describe the electrical issue you’re having?
One of my outlets stopped working in the kitchen. Nothing plugged into it gets power.
Thank you for the info. What would be an ideal date and time for you to have one of our electricians come take a look?
Hmmm, how about next week? Or maybe Wednesday lunchtime?
Thanks! Just to confirm, did you mean next Wednesday at 12:00pm? Or did you have a different time in mind? Also, is there a specific date you were referring to for Wednesday?
Actually, I’m not sure yet… My schedule is kind of up in the air next week. I’ll have to get back to you when I know my work shifts.

No problem, Matt! Whenever you have a better idea of when you’ll be available, just let us know and we can get you scheduled. If you have any other questions or need a price estimate, feel free to ask.
reason: Customer unable to provide a specific time for appointment.
